item.description:
We will meet in the back parking area of Pier One closest to the trail entry and plan to start running north on the trail at 9:00am. Distance and pace will vary so beginners should not be intimidated, an estimate of turn around locations will be available to complete specific mileage goals.

Since the paved trail in not cleared of snow and ice use your own discretion during questionable conditions but try to change your RSVP accordingly.
item.name: PIER 1 - SUNDAY RUN
